summary: My second attempt at 3D modelling, and my first ever shield! :)
descriptionHtml:
So this is a shield I made using Blender and GIMP. It's only the second thing I've ever 3D modelled, and it's the first shield I've made. I'm not saying it's brilliant, but I think for my first shield it looks pretty decent. The textures could do with a bit more work, but I'm still a beginner at texturing. And, trust me, it looked awful when I first textured it lol :P The shield itself looks similar to the iron shield (although the textures are all original), and also has spikes a bit like the targe of the blooded. It has stats similar to the elven shield, so is about average for armor protection. It can be crafted at the forge, and tempered at the work bench. Hope you like it :)

Installation: Just install normally via NMM, or extract the esp to your data folder, and merge the meshes and textures folders with the ones in your data folder.

Compatibility: There shouldn't be any issues.

Note: If enough people are interested, I have a non-spiked version (it's not textured yet) that I might upload if people don't want the spikes.
author: simsim899
